name: The Game Where You Dont Touch The Dark Things
name_original: The Game Where You Dont Touch The Dark Things
description:
A small game I made in 10 hours for the June 2022 Mini Jam. (I joined the jam late so I didn't have the full time lol)

Devlog on my YT channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxe0dG3rfQR1-cnamxqme_g/videos
